attributes.name: aria-labelledby
attributes.description: Accessibly binds the panel to the tab label

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Relative Href that links to a corresponding tab panel's id

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label for the tab's visibility trigger, overridden by the label slot

attributes.name: panel-id
attributes.description: Used to link the label to the panel in HTML

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Determines the visibility of the tab

properties.name: ariaLabelledby
properties.description: Accessibly binds the panel to the tab label

properties.name: href
properties.description: Relative Href that links to a corresponding tab panel's id

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label for the tab's visibility trigger, overridden by the label slot

properties.name: panelId
properties.description: Used to link the label to the panel in HTML

properties.name: cssClassObject
properties.type: { default: string; prefix: string; selected: string; }

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Determines the visibility of the tab

slots.description: Default slot, used for the tab's content.

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: The visual layout of the tabs

properties.name: cssClassObject
properties.type: { default: string; prefix: string; layout: { class: string; }; }

properties.name: layout
properties.description: The visual layout of the tabs

slots.description: Default slot, insert <esds-tab> components in the default slot
